Look, I poured through the reviews on this hotel, and honestly, our one-night stay here was superb. The room was huge, super clean and SO nice. AIRPORT SHUTTLE: We messaged the property (via Booking) to reserve an airport shuttle. We were given the A-okay and told that it only runs on the hour and our driver would only wait 5 minutes before leaving which meant we'd have to wait for the next hour's shuttle.

With our landing time, we had about 40 minutes to get off the plane, get our bags, go through immigration (and a second one at baggage claim) to get to the meeting point. A meeting point that given via Whatsapp. I would definitely say the exact location either needs to be changed or needs to be made much clearer (perhaps better translated?) because it seemed like the driver had no earthly idea where we were --even when we had a Spanish speaker call him, text him, voice message him etc on our location. (we were persistent!)

Anyways, the shuttle DID come 25 minutes past 7pm, and took us straight to the hotel. But without that Spanish speaker who helped us, we would not have known where or when it would arrive and probably tried to taxi. So with a better pickup location and VERY clear directions/instructions, I think it would be a decent service for people staying at their hotel.
